recipes.title: Potato Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a sieve or colander, drain potatoes, squeezing to remove excess liquid. Pat dry; set aside.                                                                                            In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder and salt. Stir in eggs until blended. Add onion and reserved potatoes; toss to coat.                                                                                           Drop by tablespoonfuls onto a preheated greased skillet. Fry in batches until lightly browned on both sides. Drain on paper towels. Serve with applesauce or syrup if desired.                                        Yield: 12 (2-inch) pancakes.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Potato Pancakes in  CountryDecember/January 1993, p51                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             One pancake (with no added salt) equals 77 calories, 1 g fat (0 saturated fat), 36 mg cholesterol, 21 mg sodium, 15 g carbohydrate, 0 fiber, 3 g protein. Diabetic Exchanges: 1 starch.                                                                                                                                                                    Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a sieve or colander, drain potatoes, squeezing to remove excess liquid. Pat dry; set aside.
In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder and salt. Stir in eggs until blended.
Add onion and reserved potatoes; toss to coat.
Drop by tablespoonfuls onto a preheated greased skillet. Fry in batches until lightly browned on both sides.
Serve with applesauce or syrup if desired.
